name: D-man
description:
Who is hungry? Think faster! Take action!

D-man is a hyper casual game in which you have to deliver food quickly and correctly while you are in the elevator.

The mechanics are very simple: there are two rooms in one of which you need to deliver a package of food. For choosing the right side, you will receive a D-coin that you can spend on your delivery man's suit, but think faster and try to get the maximum points in 60 seconds!
